rawSentence: The dinosaur is vicious, hungry, and very fast, but it can only see things that are moving.
outcomes: You run. The dinosaur chases you down and eats you!
You do not run. The dinosaur doesn't see you, and wanders off.

rawSentence: Heads up, a falling helping of scalding baby back ribs is heading straight for your face!
outcomes: You try to catch the falling ribs and get third degree burns!
You nimbly sidestep the rack of ribs. That was close!

rawSentence: The berries are red juicy delicious completely safe and there is not any other source of food for miles.
outcomes: You scarf down the tasty berries and acquire nutrition! Hurray!
You turn your nose up at the berries. Later you are forced to eat your shoe to survive!

rawSentence: The official bomb defusal manual says not to cut the blue wire under any circumstances.
outcomes: You snip the red wire. Well that was easy! High fives all around.
Carefully you position the scissors and begin to cut the bl- BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

rawSentence: The official bomb defusal manual says not to cut the red wire under any circumstances.
outcomes: Carefully you position the scissors and begin to cut the re- BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!
You snip the blue wire. Well that was easy! High fives all around.

rawSentence: The helicopter over the rooftop is evacuating POTUS from the fancy hotel with a raging fire in the lobby.
outcomes: You lead POTUS up the stairs to the roof, where Air Force One whisks them away to safety.
You storm into the ground floor, leading POTUS into dire circumstances.

rawSentence: There is red hot fire on the rooftop of the fancy hotel and the lobby is the only exit
outcomes: You climb right into the flames! The heck is wrong with you?

rawSentence: The stick you found in the field turns out to be the bone of a large rare prehistoric dog
outcomes: What a find! You make a million dollars selling it to Hollywood as a prop for that new dinosaur movie.
You hurl the priceless fossil awkwardly across the field. It bounces into a wood chipper and is destroyer forever.
